attributes.action: increase spending on research into Tiny Personal Moons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scientific studies of at least one depressed person have shown that Tiny Personal Moons would improve the mental well-being of the population of the UK. We, the undersigned, throw our full weight behind any attempts to make this dream a reality. 

Preferably, we should be able to grasp TPMs and play with them at whim, or just leave them floating serenely around our heads or bellies. 

Without this much-needed funding, many people will continue to suffer from the loneliness and isolation all-too-common in the modern world. Thank you.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
